name: Purchase Reports by Tax Category
query:
SELECT  pi.name "Invoice No::120",
	pi.supplier "Supplier:Link/Supplier:120",
	pi.net_total "Amount:Currency:120", 
	pi.base_total_taxes_and_charges "VAT:Currency:120", 
	pi.grand_total "Total:Currency:120"
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
WHERE docstatus = 1
AND pi.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s 
AND pi.taxes_and_charges LIKE %(taxes_and_charges)s
